app.title: Instagram
app.description:
Little moments lead to big friendships. Share yours on Instagram. 
‚Äî From Meta

Connect with friends, find other fans, and see what people around you are up to and into. Explore your interests and post what's going on, from your daily moments to life's highlights.

Share what you‚Äôre up to and into:
- Turn your life into a movie and discover short, entertaining videos on Instagram with Reels.
- Keep up with friends on the fly with Stories and Notes that disappear after 24 hours.
- Start group chats and share unfiltered moments with your Close Friends.
- Share memories from recent events or trips in Feed.
- Customize your posts with exclusive templates, music, stickers and filters.

Dive into your interests.
- Watch videos from your favorite creators and discover new content that‚Äôs personalized to your interests.
- Get inspired by photos and videos from new accounts in Explore.
- Discover brands and small businesses, and shop products that are relevant to your personal style.

Some Instagram features may not be available in your country or region.

Terms and Policies: https://help.instagram.com/581066165581870

Consumer Health Privacy Policy: https://privacycenter.instagram.com/policies/health

Learn how we're working to help keep our communities safe across Meta technologies at the Instagram Safety Center: https://about.instagram.com/safety

reviews.author: choey545
reviews.title: Evil, on purpose
reviews.content:
Waste, fraud, and abuse!!!
Anyone offering Medicare insurance knows this line!!!
Waste is when you cut benefits for those less fortunate than you and build a 200million dollar ball room next to the White House!!!
Fraud is when you do something that will benefit you and probably only you, you know it‚Äôs wrong, but you do it anyway!!!
Abuse is when you absolutely ruin someone, or a bunch of someones, just because you can!!! ‚ÄúBecause you‚Äôre rich, they let you‚Äù!!! But you notice, in every scenario, someone suffers! What is it with you Repuglicans! Why do you need someone to suffer for you to do well!!! I‚Äôll leave you with this!
Your anger and hatred is directed at the wrong people! 
I don‚Äôt have your money! But I Know who does!!! And they need a reason to pass it around!!!
Don‚Äôt wait for the government!
You can do it!!! Have a contest!
See who can help the neediest people in America and change their lives!! Wal-mart, you start!!!
Take2% of your gross last year and pass it back to your employees! The employee working for you who makes the least gets the largest bonus and it lessens as it goes up the organization til the CEO gets one penny! Taxing it!!!
For the company, complete deduction!!! For the people, taxed at 2%! Watch this economy take off!!! And keep doing it!! Share your business with your employees!!! It will pay off in more ways than you know!!! And one more thing!
No more!
WASTE,FRAUD,and ABUSE!!!

reviews.author: geoluv
reviews.title: Only want you to watch reels so they can blast you with ads
reviews.content: You can no longer tap a commenter‚Äôs name to go to their page to check out their wall posts.  You tap their name and nothing happens, all you can do is tap their avatar which takes you to their stories.  Instagram is doing this because every second you spend on scrolling stories/reels or scrolling your feed lets them blast you with ads and every second you spend checking out other users accounts and looking at wall posts is lost ad revenue for meta.  The whole point of ‚Äúsocial media‚Äù is to make social connection with other people.  Meta is destroying the social connectivity aspect of Instagram in order to keep you doomscrolling so they can blast ads at you.  This is a very up front and obvious example of how tech companies are actually devolving social media into a perverse profit-above-all-else social experiment.

reviews.author: I466ff4
reviews.title: Wrongly disabled
reviews.content: I‚Äôm very disappointed with Instagram right now. My accounts (@indirahh._ and @yesitsdirah) were wrongfully banned even though I didn‚Äôt break any guidelines. I had these accounts for months with no issues, and then they were suddenly taken down. I‚Äôve tried appealing but haven‚Äôt gotten any real help or explanation. It feels unfair because I see many other users with similar usernames and content who are not banned. Instagram should review bans more carefully and actually listen when people say they were suspended by mistake.

reviews.author: Stephen Githara
reviews.title: Meta will ban you for no reason and has no support whatsoever
reviews.content: I have used Instagram for almost 10 years now and this past Saturday I was wrongly banned for CSE by Meta‚Äôs faulty AI system. Immediately emailed Meta and get no response. As of the time I‚Äôm writing this, a human being has not reviewed my account yet and I‚Äôve exhausted all avenues of communication with Meta. I‚Äôve even purchased Meta Verified to speak to Meta Support and still no one has reviewed my account to see I‚Äôve done nothing wrong. This isn‚Äôt just happening to me, but thousands of accounts. Don‚Äôt get this app unless you want to get banned for no reason whatsoever.
